meanings.definition: A person who takes photographs quickly and without much thought.
meanings.sent1: The snapshooter captured the moment in a hurry.
meanings.sent2: The tourist was a snapshooter, snapping pictures at every turn.
meanings.sent3: The snapshooter almost missed the shot because they were in such a rush.
meanings.sent4: She was a snapshooter, freezing memories in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The snapshooter's camera was always ready for action.

meanings.sent2: The wildlife photographer used a snapshooter to capture animals in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The snapshooter clicked away on its own, capturing the changing scenery.
meanings.sent4: The snapshooter worked tirelessly, documenting the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The snapshooter's timer ensured no moment was missed.
